residuary.title: Zakat on Wealth
residuary.verse_en: And establish prayer and give Zakat and bow with those who bow [in worship and obedience].

livestock.title: Zakat on Livestock
livestock.verse_en: The Prophet (ï·º) said: There is no charity (Zakat) on less than forty sheep, and for forty to one hundred and twenty sheep, one sheep is due.

husband.verse_en: And for you is half of what your wives leave if they have no child. But if they have a child, for you is one fourth.

wife.verse_en: And for them is one fourth if you leave no child. But if you leave a child, then for them is an eighth.

daughter.share_condition: 1/2 if single, 2/3 if multiple, or shares with son
daughter.verse_en: Allah instructs you concerning your children: for the male, what is equal to the share of two females. If there is only one daughter, for her is half.

parents.verse_en: And for one's parents, to each of them is a sixth of his estate if he left children.
